title: Using policies.json to manage individual profiles on linux
content:
I'm having trouble using the policies.json file to manage individual profiles on Linux. I've come across sources that suggest placing the distribution/policies.json file in the profile folder should work, but I can't seem to get it to function as expected.

My use case is to create a separate profile that can only connect to localhost.

I have a few questions:

  • Is there a specific way to use policies.json for managing individual profiles on Linux? If so, what is the correct method?
  • Can the location where Firefox looks for the policies.json file be overwritten for a new process? If yes, how can this be achieved?
creator: LoopLlama

title: firefox keeps crashing directly at start
content:
Hi,

Firefox keeps crashing directly at start within seconds. I deleted Firefox and then reinstalled it again with no difference. I took away all my extensions, plugins and so forth. Firefox is updated to the latest version. Reloaded pages and I have minimal programs running in the background. I did malware and virus scans. I still cannot seem to find what the culprit is.

Thanks in advance Louie J
creator: worldt68

title: ads telemetry
content: For over a decade, I trusted Firefox implicitly, believing in your unwavering commitment to user privacy and respect. Today, that trust was shattered when I opened my browser to find ads plastered across my homepage. This isn't just an annoyance; it's a betrayal of the very principles that drew me to your software. You've reduced yourselves to the same level as the data-hungry corporations you once stood against. It's not just disappointing—it's despicable. I will not stand by and accept this violation. Consider this my farewell, as I cannot in good conscience continue to use a product that so blatantly disregards its users. You've lost more than just a customer; you've lost the respect and loyalty of someone who once championed your cause.
creator: pedrobackard

title: मैं फोनपे में शिकायत कैसे दर्ज कर सकता हूँ?
content: मैं PhonePe में शिकायत कैसे दर्ज करूँ? ग्राहक आप PhonePe हेल्पलाइन नंबर पर भी कॉल कर सकते हैं: (O88157×69262)और (24/7 उपलब्ध) समस्या की रिपोर्ट करें । PhonePe, या जिस UPI ऐप के ज़रिए आपने पैसे ट्रांसफर किए हैं, उसका इस्तेमाल करें। आप अपनी समस्या की रिपोर्ट कर सकते हैं और रिफंड का अनुरोध कर सकते है..
creator: khi900845

title: Errori visualizzazione google
content: Buongiorno a tutti, da qualche giorno le pagine di google calendar, meet, contatti, al posto dei classici bottoni di comando compaiono le "scritte" di comando. Scusate l'approssimazione con cui mi esprimo. Allego qualche screenshot. Sono consapevole che ho un pc datato etc etc, ma su un'altra macchina analoga (win 7 64 bit), stessa versione di java 42, di firefox 115, il problema non si pone. Temo di aver toccato qualcosa io, ma non riesco a ricordare, né a ripristinare. Vi sarei grato se qualcuno potesse aiutarmi, grazie. Marco G.
creator: magroppi
